9303H0239-d-03-29-93-SOO.Narrative: THE 1530 HOUSE JOB WAS PULLING OUT OF THE SOUTH STRIP AT SHOREHAM TO SHOVE CARS TO THE SOUTH LEAD. THEY HAD A HOLD OF 52 MIXED PIGGYBACK EQUIPMENT THAT INCLUDED LOADS AND EMPTIES. THE ENGINEER WAS PULLING OUT THE LEAD UNTIL HE CAME TO THE SIGNAL FOR THE HIGHLINE WHERE HE HAD TO STOP UNTIL HE GOT THESIGNAL. AFTER STOPPING FOR THE SIGNAL, THE MOVEMENT THEN CONTINUED WEST ABOUT FOUR CAR LENGTHS. FOREMAN GAVE THE ENGINEER THE OKAY TO COME EAST TO SPOT THE LEAD SO THE ENGINEER STARTED HIS MOVEMENT.ENGINEER STATED THAT HE STARTED HIS MOVEMENT BUT ONLY WENT ALITTLE WAY BEFORE HIS MOVEMENT STOPPED.FOREMAN TOLD THE ENGINEER BY RADIO THAT THEY STILL NEEDED SIX MORE CARS SO THE ENGINEER TRIED TO STRETCH THEM WEST AGAIN AND WENT ABOUT FIVE FEET BEFORE THE AIR WENT. AFTER CHECKING IT OUT THE CREW FOUND THAT FIVE LOADS HAD DERAILED, INCLUDING ONE SPINE CAR.NoneNoneNoneNoneNoneNone

DR07893-d-03-19-93-AUNW.Narrative: AT 2:40 PM ON MARCH 19, 1993, AUSTIN SWITCHER, DIESEL UNITS 8 AND 44, DERAILED 7 LOADED GONDOLAS OFROCK AT MP 56.9, AUSTIN. INVESTIGATION DEVELOPS THAT TRAIN CONSISTING OF 17 LOADS, 2 EMPTIES, 2260 TRAILING TONS WAS MOVING EAST ON MAIN TRACK AT APPROXIMATELY EIGHT MPH WHEN THE 9TH THROUGH 15TH CARSDERAILED UPRIGHT. INVESTIGATION FURTHER REVEALED THAT LEAD TRUCK OF 10TH CAR, TRAX 8066, DROPPED INBETWEEN RAILS ON 5 DEGREE CURVE TO THE RIGHT JUST IN ADVANCE OF WEBBERVILLE ROAD. DERAILED CAR MOVED THROUGH WEBBERVILLE ROAD DESTROYING CROSSING PLANKS AND FURTHER SPREADING GAUGE ALLOWING TRAILINGTRUCK OF 9TH POSITIONED CAR TO DROP IN AS WELL AS THE NEXT FIVE TRAILING CARS BEFORE TRAIN STOPPED.THE LEADING TWO DERAILED CARS WERE PULLED ON BY AUSTIN SWICHER AT 4:10PM. GANDY TURN POWER WAS BROUGHT DOWN AGAINST REAR OF TRAIN AND RERAILED TRAILING THREE DERAILED CARS AT 5:20PM MARCH 19, CLEARINGWEBBERVILLE ROAD CROSSING IN THE PROCESS. THE 3RD POSITIONED DERAILED CAR WAS RERAILED ON SATURDAYMORNING. THE CAR IN POSITION 4 WAS TOO FAR OFF END OF TIES TO BE PULLED ON. AN 80 TON CRANE WAS ENGAGED LOCALLY ON MON DAY, MARCH 22. LAST CAR WAS RERAILED AT 9:40AM THAT DATE.NoneNoneNone
